formFieldList.label: Auto Resolve Incident When Alerts are Cleared
formFieldList.help: Select whether to auto resolve on group expiry

formFieldList.label: Delay To Create Incident (minutes)
formFieldList.help: Holds incident creation until the defined delay expires while executing correlation. If an alert with a lower network layer is received, the incident will be created immediately.

formFieldList.label: When Group Limit Is Exceeded
formFieldList.help: Choose what happens to alerts once the group exceeds its limit â€” either open a new incident or mark additional alerts as Suppressed.
